positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Engineering scalable web applications and services for enterprise travel platforms, delivering high-impact features that enhance user experience and business outcomes.
responsibilities: Architected and delivered modern web applications using Angular, React, and TypeScript within Agile sprint cycles, consistently meeting delivery timelines
Implemented robust testing frameworks and comprehensive unit test suites, improving code coverage and reducing production defects
Drove performance optimization initiatives resulting in faster load times and enhanced application reliability across the platform
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on platform architecture decisions, contributing to design patterns and technical standards
Developed reusable component libraries and design systems that accelerated feature development across multiple teams

positions.title: UI Developer
positions.description: Led front-end development initiatives for enterprise software solutions, driving innovation in UI/UX design and championing modern development practices.
responsibilities: Engineered high-performance web applications using Angular, React, and modern JavaScript frameworks, delivering features for global enterprise clients
Spearheaded responsive design implementation across web-capable devices and browsers, ensuring consistent user experience
Championed Agile development processes, contributing to sprint planning, code reviews, and continuous process improvements
Optimized application performance through code splitting, lazy loading, and efficient state management, significantly improving page load speeds
Collaborated with UX designers and product managers to translate business requirements into technical solutions and user-friendly interfaces
Mentored junior developers on best practices for responsive layouts, fluid design, and CSS media queries
Conducted thorough testing and user acceptance validation for web applications, ensuring quality deliverables

positions.title: Senior UI Engineer
positions.description: Led Angular development initiatives and architected scalable component libraries, establishing front-end best practices and accessibility standards.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented enterprise Angular applications with modular, reusable component architecture, reducing development time for new features
Designed and deployed secure JWT-based authentication system, enhancing application security and user session management
Developed comprehensive data export functionality supporting multiple file formats (CSV, Excel, PDF), improving data accessibility for users
Integrated RESTful APIs with optimized data fetching strategies, implementing error handling and retry mechanisms for improved reliability
Led accessibility compliance initiatives (WCAG 2.0), ensuring inclusive user experiences across all application features
Executed performance optimization strategies including lazy loading, change detection optimization, and bundle size reduction
Established UI/UX best practices and coding standards, mentoring team members on semantic HTML, accessibility, and responsive design

positions.title: UI Developer
positions.company: Connect | 91 Web Solution Pvt. Ltd. (Polyscripts Infotech Pvt. Ltd.)
positions.description: Transformed design concepts into pixel-perfect, cross-browser compatible web experiences, specializing in e-commerce platforms and responsive design.
responsibilities: Created intuitive UI/UX designs using Adobe Photoshop and Sketch, collaborating with stakeholders to align visual design with business goals
Converted design mockups (PSD, Sketch) into semantic, accessible HTML5/CSS3 templates with pixel-perfect accuracy
Built scalable SASS framework architecture for large-scale e-commerce applications, establishing design tokens and component patterns
Implemented responsive design solutions using mobile-first approach, ensuring optimal user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Conducted cross-browser compatibility testing and resolved rendering issues across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Internet Explorer
Optimized front-end assets (images, CSS, JavaScript) for faster page load times and improved SEO performance

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: Delivered full-stack web solutions from concept to deployment, specializing in WordPress development and e-commerce platforms.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained custom WordPress websites, creating themes and plugins tailored to client requirements
Engineered automated cron-job systems for scheduled email notifications and data synchronization tasks
Designed responsive email templates with cross-client compatibility (Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail) ensuring consistent rendering
Built e-commerce and retail applications using PHP MVC frameworks (CodeIgniter, Laravel), implementing shopping cart functionality and payment gateway integration
Created interactive, responsive web interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery, enhancing user engagement
Participated in complete software development lifecycle including requirements gathering, development, testing, and deployment
Provided ongoing website maintenance and feature enhancements based on client feedback and analytics data
